creator: d.w.pluim@planet.nl
text:
Hello, after installing McAfee Professional I'm getting the following
errormessages (sorry for the Dutch text):

[Sat Oct 19 13:16:58 2002] [notice] Parent: Created child process 2908
[Sat Oct 19 13:16:58 2002] [notice] Child 2908: Child process is running
[Sat Oct 19 13:16:58 2002] [notice] Child 2908: Acquired the start mutex.
[Sat Oct 19 13:16:58 2002] [notice] Child 2908: Starting 250 worker threads.
[Sat Oct 19 13:16:58 2002] [error] (730038)Er is geprobeerd een bewerking uit te
voeren op iets anders dan een socket.  : winnt_accept: AcceptEx failed.
Attempting to recover.
[Sat Oct 19 13:16:58 2002] [error] (730038)Er is geprobeerd een bewerking uit te
voeren op iets anders dan een socket.  : winnt_accept: AcceptEx failed.
Attempting to recover.

The harddisk is spinning and spinning as the same message appears several times
a second.

I read something in the bug-database about the same message but that was in a
previous version and that the bug should be fixed. But can this have something
to do with McAfee VirusScan Pro 7.0? It used to work like a charm.

Regards, Dick
Just installed 1.3.27 and now it's working smoothly.
creator: d.w.pluim@planet.nl

text:
VirusScan inteferes with socket reuse... query on Keyword 'FAQ' for the
  similar reports
creator: wrowe@apache.org
